Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 377,585 SF | EXCEPTIONALLY LOCATED MANUFACTURING FACILITY WITH CRANES

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Loading: 6 Docks; 2 docks are semi-truck accessible; 5 docks are double wide; 9 Drive-ins
There is a secure, elevated 8,000 sq. ft. patio attached to the back of building that is dock accessible
Parking: 15 individual parking spaces; Additional surface parking for 50 more vehicles. Additionally, two vacant city lots, one is paved with 20 parking spaces

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located directly between the Highland Square neighborhood and the Akron CBD

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This 27,252 sq. ft. warehouse building is situated on 1.55 acres at a signalized intersection. Over 120,000 people live within 10 minutes of the site. The Owner will sell or lease the building. Or, the building can make an excellent development opportunity.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Unique Warehouse Building Near Highland Square

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: As of 2/1/21, we will have 37,259 Sq. Ft. that has 2 Overhead doors and 2 loading docks
As of 4/1/21 (approx.) we will have another 50,850 Sq. Ft., that space has no Overhead doors and 6 Loading docks
